Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(Value) elseif Mode == "GetCamera" and Value then local PropertyValue = nil if Value.Property then pcall(function() PropertyValue = Camera[Value.Property] end) end return PropertyValue elseif Mode == "SetCamera" and Value then if Value.Property and Value.Value then pcall(function() Camera[Value.Property] = Value.Value end) end end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) local ServerReturn = nil pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) return ServerReturn end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = false}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover")
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
BaseArrow = BasePart:Clone() BaseArrow.Name = "Arrow" BaseArrow.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 3) ArrowMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") ArrowMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh ArrowMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=186758016" ArrowMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=186758038" ArrowMesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) ArrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) ArrowMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) ArrowMesh.Parent = BaseArrow
BaseQuiver = BasePart:Clone() BaseQuiver.Name = "Quiver" BaseQuiver.Size = Vector3.new(1.25, 2.5, 1.25) QuiverMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") QuiverMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh QuiverMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=186758000" QuiverMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=186758038" QuiverMesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) QuiverMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5, 0.75, 1.5) QuiverMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) QuiverMesh.Parent = BaseQuiver
Animations = { Reload = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Reload"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 0.75, Duration = nil}, Aim = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Aim"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, HoldAim = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("HoldAim"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, }
Sounds = { Fire = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire"), Hit = Handle:WaitForChild("Hit") }
Range = 250 Power = 100 Rate = (1 / 30) WindVec = Vector3.new(2, -1, 1).unit
ToolEquipped = false MouseDown = false ArrowExists = true
DisplayModel = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayModel") if DisplayModel then DisplayModel:Destroy() end
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player and ToolEquipped and CheckIfAlive() then if Mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = Value.Key local Down = Value.Down if Key == "q" and Down then end elseif Mode == "MouseClick" then if Value.Down then Activated() elseif ToolEquipped and MouseDown and Arrow and Arrow.Parent and ArrowWeld and ArrowWeld.Parent then MouseDown = false
Sounds.Fire:Play()
local BaseDamage = 5 local FireDamage = Round((GetPercentage(0.5, -0.85, ArrowWeld.C0.Z) / 1.5), 0.5) FireDamage = ((FireDamage < BaseDamage and BaseDamage) or FireDamage)
local CurrentArrow = Arrow
Arrow = nil
local MousePosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition") local StartPos = Handle.Position local Vec = (MousePosition - StartPos).unit
local Hit, EndPos = CastRay(StartPos, Vec, Range, Character, false) local FakeVec = (EndPos - StartPos).unit
if ArrowWeld and ArrowWeld.Parent then ArrowWeld:Destroy() end
local HitSound = Sounds.Hit:Clone() HitSound.Parent = CurrentArrow
Debris:AddItem(CurrentArrow, 20) CurrentArrow.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
if Hit and Hit.Parent then HitSound:Play() local NewCF = CFrame.new(EndPos, (EndPos + FakeVec)) * CFrame.new(0, 0, 0.5) CurrentArrow.CFrame = NewCF local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Hit Weld.Part1 = CurrentArrow Weld.C0 = Hit.CFrame:inverse() * NewCF Weld.C1 = NewCF:inverse() * NewCF Weld.Parent = CurrentArrow local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Tool") or character:IsA("Hat") then character = character.Parent end if character and character ~= Character then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) local NewHealth = (humanoid.Health - FireDamage) humanoid:TakeDamage(FireDamage) if NewHealth > 0 and CurrentArrow:FindFirstChild("Fire") then local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then local CharacterSize = character:GetModelSize() local IceCube = BasePart:Clone() IceCube.Name = "IceCube" IceCube.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") IceCube.Transparency = 0.25 IceCube.Material = Enum.Material.Ice IceCube.Size = (Vector3.new(CharacterSize.Y, CharacterSize.Y, CharacterSize.Y) + Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5)) IceCube.Anchored = true IceCube.CFrame = torso.CFrame local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = IceCube Weld.Part1 = torso Weld.Parent = IceCube Debris:AddItem(IceCube, 20) IceCube.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end end end end else CurrentArrow.CFrame = CFrame.new(EndPos, (EndPos + FakeVec)) CurrentArrow.CFrame = CurrentArrow.CFrame + CurrentArrow.CFrame.lookVector * 1.25 CurrentArrow.Velocity = (FakeVec * Power) end
Spawn(function() DrawBeam(StartPos, EndPos, BrickColor.new("Institutional white"), 0.25) end)
for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end
end end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ReturnValue = nil pcall(function() ReturnValue = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ReturnValue end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function GetPercentage(Start, End, Number) return (((Number - Start) / (End - Start)) * 100) end
function Round(Number, RoundDecimal) local WholeNumber, Decimal = math.modf(Number) return ((Decimal >= RoundDecimal and math.ceil(Number)) or (Decimal < RoundDecimal and math.floor(Number))) end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function CheckIntangible(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit) local LowercaseName = string.lower(Hit.Name) if character == Character or Hit.Transparency > 0.8 or string.sub(LowercaseName, 1, string.len("effect")) == "effect" or Hit.Name == "Bullet" or LowercaseName == "laser" or LowercaseName == "water" or LowercaseName == "rail" or LowercaseName == "arrow" then return true end end return false end
function CastRay(StartPos, Vec, Length, IgnoreList, DelayIfHit) local Hit, EndPos = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(StartPos, Vec * Length), IgnoreList) if Hit and CheckIntangible(Hit) then if DelayIfHit then wait() end Hit, EndPos = CastRay((EndPos + (Vec * 0.01)), Vec, (Length - ((StartPos-EndPos).magnitude)), IgnoreList, DelayIfHit) end return Hit, EndPos end
function DrawBeam(BeamStart, BeamEnd, Color, FadeDelay) local Distance = (BeamStart - BeamEnd).magnitude local Laser = Instance.new("Part") Laser.Name = "Laser" Laser.Anchored = true Laser.CanCollide = false Laser.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Laser.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Laser.Size = Vector3.new( 0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Laser.Transparency = 5 Laser.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Laser.Locked = true Laser.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Laser.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Laser.BrickColor = Color Laser.CFrame = CFrame.new(BeamEnd, BeamStart) * CFrame.new(0, 0, (-Distance / 2)) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) local LaserMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") LaserMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, (Distance * 5), 1) LaserMesh.Parent = Laser Debris:AddItem(Laser, (FadeDelay * 3)) Laser.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
local Frames = math.floor(FadeDelay / Rate) for Frame = 1, Frames do wait(Rate) local Percent = (Frame / Frames) Laser.CFrame = (Laser.CFrame + (WindVec * Rate)) Laser.Transparency = (0.5 + (Percent * 0.5)) end Delay(1, function() Laser:Destroy() end) end
function CreateQuiver() if Quiver and Quiver.Parent then Quiver:Destroy() end Quiver = BaseQuiver:Clone() local QuiverWeld = Instance.new("Weld") QuiverWeld.Part0 = Quiver QuiverWeld.Part1 = Torso QuiverWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0.95) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) QuiverWeld.Parent = Quiver Quiver.Parent = Tool end
function CreateArrow() if Arrow and Arrow.Parent then Arrow:Destroy() end Arrow = BaseArrow:Clone() ArrowWeld = Instance.new("Weld") ArrowWeld.Part0 = Arrow ArrowWeld.Part1 = Handle ArrowWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0.5) ArrowWeld.Parent = Arrow Arrow.Parent = Tool end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end Tool.Enabled = false local CurrentlyEquipped = true if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) if not Arrow or not Arrow.Parent then local LeftArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if not LeftArm then return end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end local Animation = Animations.Reload InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) wait(0.5) if CurrentlyEquipped and CheckIfAlive() and LeftArm.Parent then EquipArrow = BaseArrow:Clone() local TemporaryArrowWeld = Instance.new("Weld") TemporaryArrowWeld.Part0 = EquipArrow TemporaryArrowWeld.Part1 = LeftArm TemporaryArrowWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 1, 0.5) TemporaryArrowWeld.Parent = EquipArrow Debris:AddItem(EquipArrow, 5) EquipArrow.Parent = Tool wait(1.25) if CurrentlyEquipped and CheckIfAlive() then if EquipArrow and EquipArrow.Parent then EquipArrow:Destroy() end CreateArrow() end end else local Animation = Animations.Aim InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) MouseDown = true Delay(1.5, function() if CurrentlyEquipped and CheckIfAlive() and Arrow and Arrow.Parent then local Animation = Animations.HoldAim InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) end end) local PullingBack = true if CurrentlyEquipped and CheckIfAlive() and Arrow and Arrow.Parent then while ToolEquipped and MouseDown and PullingBack and CheckIfAlive() and Arrow and Arrow.Parent and ArrowWeld and ArrowWeld.Parent do if ArrowWeld.C0.Z > -0.85 then ArrowWeld.C0 = ArrowWeld.C0 - Vector3.new(0, 0, 0.025) if ArrowWeld.C0.Z <= -0.85 then ArrowWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -0.85) local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Name = "Fire" Fire.Color = Color3.new((0 / 255), (255 / 255), (255 / 255)) Fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new((0 / 255), (0 / 255), (255 / 255)) Fire.Heat = 0 Fire.Size = 2.5 Fire.Enabled = true Fire.Parent = Arrow end end Spawn(function() local FieldOfView = InvokeClient("GetCamera", {Property = "FieldOfView"}) local NewValue = ((PullingBack and (((FieldOfView - 0.25) < 55 and 55) or (FieldOfView - 0.25))) or 70) if FieldOfView then InvokeClient("SetCamera", {Property = "FieldOfView", Value = NewValue}) end end) wait(0.001) end PullingBack = false Spawn(function() InvokeClient("SetCamera", {Property = "FieldOfView", Value = 70}) end) end end if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end Tool.Enabled = true end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped(Mouse) ToolEquipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Spawn(function() for i, v in pairs({Quiver, Arrow, EquipArrow}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end CreateQuiver() if ArrowExists then CreateArrow() end local RemoverClone = Remover:Clone() RemoverClone.Name = (Player.Name .. Remover.Name) local CreatorValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorValue.Name = "Creator" CreatorValue.Value = Player CreatorValue.Parent = RemoverClone local ToolValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") ToolValue.Name = "Tool" ToolValue.Value = Tool ToolValue.Parent = RemoverClone RemoverClone.Disabled = false RemoverClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end) end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false MouseDown = false ArrowExists = (((Arrow and Arrow.Parent) and true) or false) Spawn(function() for i, v in pairs({ToolUnequipped}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end for i, v in pairs({Quiver, Arrow, EquipArrow}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end if ArrowExists then CreateArrow() end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do v:Stop() InvokeClient("StopSound", v) end end) end
CreateArrow() Tool.Enabled = true
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
FixCamera = script:FindFirstChild("FixCamera")
Creator = Model:FindFirstChild("Creator") Tool = Model:FindFirstChild("Tool")
function DestroyModel() Debris:AddItem(Model, 2) if Creator and Creator.Parent then local Backpack = Creator:FindFirstChild("Backpack") local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false FixCameraClone.Parent = ((Backpack and Backpack) or Character) end end
if not FixCamera or not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value:IsA("Player") or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Tool or not Tool.Value or not Tool.Value.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Creator = Creator.Value Tool = Tool.Value
Character = Creator.Character if not Character then DestroyModel() return end
Creator.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Creator.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Character.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" then DestroyModel() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Camera.FieldOfView = 70
Debris:AddItem(script, 2)
